}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is presumed to be a '''[[Winstars]]''' WS-WNU683NA.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.monoprice.com/products/product_print.asp?c_id=105&cp_id=10501&cs_id=1050108&p_id=6148 Printable product page] :indicates the device uses RTL8188SU
[http://www.linuxforums.org/forum/wireless-internet/184946-any-hope-monoprice-usb-wifi-devices-ralink-realtek.html USB ID oddities / corrupt EEPROM (0bda:8171 --> 0bda:8192 ??)]
